title: India vows to spoil Murali’s finale
content: GALLE: India is determined not to join the party as Sri Lanka celebrates World record wicket-taker Muttiah Muralitharan’s final cricket Test appearance in Galle from Sunday. The off-spinner, 38, will retire after the opening contest of the three-match series at the Galle International Stadium, in which he needs eight scalps to reach the unprecedented 800-wicket…
